headline: Marriott extends branded residential portfolio in EMEA
summary: The portfolio now encompasses 70 projects, with 43 in the pipeline and 27 already open.

headline: MARRIOTT INTERNATIONAL SIGNS AGREEMENT TO BRING THE SECOND EDITION HOTEL TO SHANGHAI
summary: Marriott International Inc. recently announced that it has signed an agreement with New Development Group to bring the second EDITION Hotels to Shanghai, set to open in 2026. Striking the perfect balance between taste-making design, excellent service, and an authentic connection to the locale, The Shanghai EDITION, Changfeng Park, aims to redefine the concept of luxury in the vibrant Putuo District.

headline: Marriott International Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President, Development to Speak at the Barclays 2024 Eat, Sleep, Play Conference December 5; Remarks to be Webcast
summary: Marriott International, Inc.'s (Nasdaq: MAR) Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President, Development, Leeny Oberg, will speak at the Barclays 2024 Eat, Sleep, Play Conference, to be held on Thursday, December 5, in New York, NY. Ms. Oberg's remarks will be at approximately 10:30 a.m., Eastern Time, and will be webcast live.
